entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
